title: My Grandfather TL
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indigenous peoples - Social life and customs
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
abstract: 'My Grandfather TL was a strong, proud Aboriginal man'.
description: Simone Andy's fondly recalls her great-grandfather Thomas Lyon or, as he was known, Grandfather TL. A proud, strong Aboriginal man, Grandfather TL fought in the war and finally recieved his medals in 1996. His death in 1989 set Andy on a journey to find out more about her beloved great-grandfather and, ultimately, to find out who she is.
